question:
Which among the following about the Subsidiary Alliance is/ are true?
1. The ruler who entered into this alliance will have to deploy British forces with maintenance fee
2. Alliance with any other powers was totally prohibited without British consent
3. All other Europeans except the British will have to be dismissed
4. The company will protect the ruler from external threat as well as internal disturbance
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: The Subsidiary Alliance was started in the year 1798. It was like a treaty between the English and the rulers of India. As per the treaty, The ruler who entered into this alliance will have to deploy British forces with a maintenance fee or had to cede a part of his territory and in return, the company will protect the ruler from external threat as well as an internal disturbance. Alliance with any other powers was totally prohibited without British consent and all other Europeans except the British will have to be dismissed from the territory. The Nizam of Hyderabad was the first to sign this treaty in 1798.
